purpose: Captures user responses and maps them to dimension indicators for execution in the interpretation pipeline.

question_format.notes: Forced choice + scenario-based yield the highest predictive accuracy.

mapping_logic.forced_choice: Maps directly to high-signal dimension indicators.
mapping_logic.Likert_scale: Used for weighting strength of dimension responses.
mapping_logic.scenario-based: Reveals stress-state shifts and override needs.

initialize_question_set.description: Builds question set based on dimension_mapping and required indicators.

collect_responses.description: Captures all user answers and normalizes input formats.

normalize_responses.description: Converts raw user input into canonical format.

map_to_dimensions.description: Translates normalized answers into dimension indicators.

validate_input.description: Checks for contradictions, missing data, and inconsistent choices.

send_to_execution_engine.description: Dispatches dimension indicators to the execution engine.

fallback_rules.missing_answers: Impute neutral values and mark confidence low.
fallback_rules.contradiction_detected: Send contradiction pair to Interpretation Engine for resolution.
fallback_rules.ambiguous_input: Default to scenario-derived signal when available.
